hero.title: Travel with elegance, comfort and punctuality
hero.description: Since 1998, Patty Car has been offering high-level chauffeur services (NCC), guaranteeing exclusive and personalized transfers in Italy and abroad. Whether for business or pleasure, our service is available 24/7 to meet all your travel needs.
hero.subDescription: Whether you're heading to a business meeting, a special event, or simply desire a luxury transfer, Patty Car is the perfect choice for all your travel needs.

about.label: About Us
about.title: A prestigious NCC service since 1998
about.paragraph1: Patty Car is a reference point in the chauffeur service sector. With offices in Milan and Rome and a widespread network of collaborators, we operate throughout the national and international territory. We have had the honor of serving prestigious events such as Expo 2015 and the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. Our mission is to offer impeccable service, available 24 hours a day, every day of the week, to guarantee you a stress-free travel experience with maximum comfort.

transfer-ncc.title: NCC Transfer
transfer-ncc.subtitle: Your time is precious, your comfort is essential
transfer-ncc.intro: Your time is a treasure, and every journey deserves to be treated with the same care and attention reserved for the most exclusive details.
transfer-ncc.description: With our luxury transfer service, every journey becomes a moment of pure pleasure and satisfaction, designed for those who know that the value of an experience is measured not only in the certainty of arrival, but also in the quality of the journey.

sections.title: Serenity
sections.description: Your time is a treasure, and every journey deserves to be treated with the same care and attention reserved for the most exclusive details.

sections.title: Punctuality
sections.description: Imagine being welcomed by a professional, elegant, and discreet chauffeur, ready to drive you to your destination in a vehicle of excellence, selected to offer the maximum of luxury and comfort.

sections.title: Always available
sections.description: For our most demanding clients, our service is available 24 hours a day, both in Italy and abroad, guaranteeing unparalleled continuity.

highlight.text: Whether you're looking for a first-class airport transfer, transportation for prestigious events, or simply the comfort of a stress-free journey, our service is synonymous with elegance and safety.

transfer-ncc.conclusion: With us, every journey is more than just a simple transfer: it's an opportunity to experience luxury, refinement, and elegance at every moment.

events.title: Transport for events
events.subtitle: Elegant transportation for every special occasion
events.intro: Every special event deserves a memorable entrance. Our event transportation service ensures that you and your guests arrive in style and on time.
events.description: Whether it's a wedding, a corporate ceremony, or a gala event, our team of professionals will take care of every detail to ensure an impeccable transportation experience. We offer a fleet of luxury vehicles, experienced drivers, and personalized service to meet the specific needs of your event.

sections.title: Detailed Planning
sections.description: Complete coordination with event organizers to ensure that every aspect of transportation is perfectly synchronized with the event schedule.

sections.title: Group Management
sections.description: Solutions for groups of any size, with logistical coordination to ensure that all guests arrive on time and in total comfort.

sections.title: Premium Service
sections.description: Attention to details and customization for each event, with vehicles decorated according to your preferences and drivers in formal attire.

highlight.text: With our event service, every special occasion becomes even more memorable. From weddings to corporate ceremonies, we guarantee a transportation experience that reflects the importance of your event.

events.conclusion: With Patty Car, transportation becomes an integral part of the success of your event, ensuring a memorable experience for you and your guests.

diplomatic.title: Diplomatic services
diplomatic.subtitle: Reserved and professional transportation for diplomatic delegations
diplomatic.intro: Patty Car's diplomatic services are designed to meet the specific needs of embassies, consulates, and international delegations, ensuring security, discretion, and professionalism.
diplomatic.description: Our experience in serving diplomatic clients has allowed us to develop specific protocols that respect the security and confidentiality requirements. We collaborate with law enforcement when necessary and guarantee impeccable service for every diplomatic mission.

sections.title: Security
sections.description: Advanced security protocols and coordination with law enforcement to ensure safe transfers for high-profile personalities.

sections.title: Confidentiality
sections.description: Maximum discretion and respect for privacy, with drivers selected and specifically trained to serve diplomatic clientele.

sections.title: International Experience
sections.description: Multilingual staff and knowledge of international diplomatic protocols for a service that respects conventions and traditions.

highlight.text: Our diplomatic service has been chosen by numerous embassies and consulates for its reliability and professionalism. We understand the importance of protocol and ensure that every aspect of the service meets the highest standards.

diplomatic.conclusion: With Patty Car, diplomatic delegations can rely on a service that understands the importance of protocol, security, and discretion.

luxury-hotels.title: Luxury Hotel Services
luxury-hotels.subtitle: Exclusive transportation service for guests of the best hotels
luxury-hotels.intro: Patty Car collaborates with the best luxury hotels to offer their guests an impeccable transportation experience, extending the elegance and comfort of the hotel to the final destination.
luxury-hotels.description: Our luxury hotel service is designed to integrate perfectly with the experience offered by the hotel. We offer an extension of the luxury and attention to detail that guests expect, ensuring continuity in service excellence.

sections.title: Hotel Integration
sections.description: Service perfectly integrated with partner hotel facilities, with direct communication between our team and the hotel concierge.

sections.title: Premium Experience
sections.description: Extension of the hotel's luxury experience during transportation, with high-end vehicles and personalized services.

sections.title: 24/7 Availability
sections.description: Service available at any time for hotel guests, with bookings managed directly by the reception or concierge.

highlight.text: Our collaboration with luxury hotels has allowed us to develop a service that meets the expectations of the most demanding guests. We offer airport transfers, personalized tours, and private chauffeur services for shopping and events.

luxury-hotels.conclusion: Choosing Patty Car for hotel transportation services means guaranteeing guests a travel experience that matches the prestige of the facility.

business.title: Business transfers
business.subtitle: Mobility solutions for professionals and companies
business.intro: Patty Car offers tailored business transportation solutions for professionals and companies that require reliability, punctuality, and discretion in their business travel.
business.description: Our business service is designed to optimize the valuable time of professionals, ensuring punctual and comfortable transfers. We offer customized solutions for companies with regular transportation needs, with the possibility of corporate accounts and detailed reporting.

sections.title: Professionalism
sections.description: Experienced and discreet drivers, accustomed to the needs of the business world, ready to adapt to schedule changes and last-minute requests.

sections.title: Efficiency
sections.description: Optimization of travel times and guaranteed punctuality, with constant traffic monitoring and planning of alternative routes.

sections.title: Global Coverage
sections.description: Service available in Italy and abroad, with international partners to ensure continuity of service wherever your business takes you.

highlight.text: Our business solutions include airport transfers, dedicated chauffeur service for meeting days, transportation for corporate events and conferences, and solutions for team trips and delegations.

business.conclusion: Choosing Patty Car for business transfers means investing in the productivity and image of your company, ensuring comfort and punctuality in every journey.

fleet.title: Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Elegance and prestige in every detail
fleet.description: Our fleet consists of high-end vehicles, selected to offer the maximum comfort, refinement, and safety. Travel with us and discover the pleasure of unparalleled comfort.

highlight.text: Entrust your journey to our fleet and experience excellence at every kilometer.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This document provides information on how PATTY CAR SERVICE Srl and PATTY CAR di GHIRLANDI ENRICO (hereinafter "Patty Car", "we", "us", or "our") process personal data collected through the website www.pattycar.com.

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller for personal data collected through the website www.pattycar.com is PATTY CAR SERVICE Srl, with registered office in Rome, Via del Velodromo n. 44, VAT number 16640371007. Contact email: pattycar@pattycar.com

developerResponsibility.title: 2. Website Developer Responsibility
developerResponsibility.content: The company that developed the website, SKEELS SRLS with registered office in Milan, Via Boscovich 31 - VAT number 11707420961, assumes full responsibility for ensuring that the website complies with applicable data protection legislation, in particular with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR).

purposesOfProcessing.title: 3. Purposes of Personal Data Processing
purposesOfProcessing.content: Personal data collected through the website www.pattycar.com are processed for the following purposes:
items: Provision of chauffeur service (NCC): Managing bookings, organizing and providing the requested service (including travel details, schedules, and chosen vehicle).
Management of contact requests: Responding to questions or requests sent through the contact form or other communication methods.
Tax and accounting compliance: To comply with legal, tax, and regulatory obligations, including the management of invoices and tax documents.
Direct marketing (optional): Sending promotional or marketing communications via email, if the user has explicitly provided consent for this purpose.
Statistical analysis and service improvement: Collection of data related to website usage for statistical analysis and to improve service quality.

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Data Processing
legalBasis.content: The processing of personal data is carried out on the following legal bases provided by the GDPR:
items: Performance of a contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR): Processing necessary for the provision of the chauffeur service and to respond to user requests.
User consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR): Processing for direct marketing purposes and for other optional activities, only with the explicit consent of the user.
Compliance with legal obligations (Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR): Processing to comply with legal obligations, such as issuing invoices or storing data for tax purposes.

dataTypes.title: 5. Types of Data Processed
dataTypes.content: The personal data processed may include, but are not limited to, the following categories of information:
items: Identification data: name, surname, tax code.
Contact data: email address, phone number, residential address.
Payment data: information related to payments made, including credit card data, if applicable.
Navigation data: IP address, date and time of access, type of browser used, operating system.
Data related to the requested service: booking details (times, vehicle, destination), travel preferences, user feedback.
Other data that the user may voluntarily provide through the contact form, newsletter subscription, etc.

processingMethods.title: 6. Data Processing Methods
processingMethods.content: The processing of personal data takes place through electronic (both automated and manual) and IT methods, and in some cases also on paper. Data are processed in compliance with adequate security measures to protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of personal data. Access to personal data is allowed only to authorized personnel, who use them exclusively for the purposes described.

dataRetention.title: 7. Personal Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Personal data are kept for a period not exceeding that necessary for the purposes for which they were collected. In general, data will be kept for a period of 5 years from collection. However, in case of specific legal or contractual obligations, the retention period may be longer.

dataSharing.title: 8. Communication of Data to Third Parties
dataSharing.content: Personal data collected will not be disclosed to unauthorized subjects. However, data may be communicated to third parties in the following situations:
items: Service providers (e.g., drivers, payment platforms) for the provision of the chauffeur service.
External professionals (tax consultants, legal advisors, auditors) for consulting needs or mandatory compliance.
Public entities and competent authorities (e.g., law enforcement) if required by law.
dataSharing.additionalContent: Personal data are not transferred to third parties outside the European Union, except in cases where it is necessary for the provision of the service (e.g., international payment services or invoice issuance).

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Transfer of Personal Data
internationalTransfers.content: Personal data are stored within the European Union. However, some services may involve the transfer of personal data to countries outside the European Union. In such cases, the transfer will only take place in compliance with the GDPR, using adequate legal instruments such as Standard Contractual Clauses.

userRights.title: 10. Rights of the Data Subject
userRights.content: Under the GDPR, the user has the right to:
items: Access their personal data (Art. 15 GDPR): obtain confirmation of the existence of the data and a copy of the same.
Request rectification of data (Art. 16 GDPR): correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Request erasure of data (Art. 17 GDPR - Right to be forgotten): request the removal of personal data in the circumstances provided by law.
Request restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR): limit the use of data in certain situations.
Object to processing (Art. 21 GDPR): object, for legitimate reasons, to the processing of data.
Request data portability (Art. 20 GDPR): receive the data in a machine-readable format and transmit it to another controller.
Withdraw consent (Art. 7 GDPR): withdraw consent provided for processing based on this legal basis.
userRights.additionalContent: To exercise these rights, users can send a request via email to pattycar@pattycar.com. If the user believes that their rights have been violated, they can lodge a complaint with the Data Protection Authority (https://www.garanteprivacy.it).

dpo.title: 11. Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpo.content: At present, a Data Protection Officer (DPO) has not been appointed. For any questions regarding data processing, or to exercise your rights, you can contact the data controller at pattycar@pattycar.com.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.content: The website www.pattycar.com uses cookies to improve the browsing experience, to collect statistics, and for marketing purposes.

types.title: 1. Technical Cookies:
types.description: Essential for the functioning of the website, such as those to keep the user's session active during navigation.

types.title: 2. Analytical Cookies:
types.description: Used to collect aggregate data on website usage (e.g., Google Analytics).

types.title: 3. Profiling Cookies:
types.description: Used to personalize advertising and send promotional content in line with the user's interests (e.g., Facebook Pixel, Google Ads).

management.title: Cookie acceptance:
management.description: At first access, the site shows a banner that requests consent for the use of cookies. The user can choose to accept or customize their cookie preferences.

management.title: Cookie disabling:
management.description: Users can disable cookies through their browser settings. However, some website features may not be accessible without cookies.

cookiePolicy.thirdParty: The site uses third-party cookies, including for performance analysis and advertising. The user can consult the relevant policies for more details.

changes.title: 12. Changes to the Privacy & Cookie Policy
changes.content: The controller reserves the right to modify this Privacy and Cookie Policy at any time. Any changes will be communicated through the website and will be binding from the date of publication of the update.

userResponsibility.title: 13. User Responsibility
userResponsibility.content: The user undertakes, by accessing and using the website www.pattycar.com, to fully comply with the provisions of the Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, and Terms of Service, as well as all applicable regulations regarding the protection of personal data and Italian laws.

liability.title: 14. Limitation of Liability of Patty Car
liability.content: Patty Car makes every effort to ensure that the website www.pattycar.com is accessible and functions correctly. However, the user acknowledges and agrees that Patty Car cannot be held responsible for certain events, unless they derive from willful misconduct or gross negligence on the part of Patty Car.

serviceChanges.title: 15. Changes to the Service and Website
serviceChanges.content: Patty Car reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the website and the services offered at any time, with or without notice, for technical, organizational, or legal reasons.

jurisdiction.title: 16. Jurisdiction and Applicable Law
jurisdiction.content: This contract is governed by Italian law. For any dispute that may arise in relation to the interpretation, execution, or validity of this document, the parties agree that the competent court will exclusively be the Court of MILAN, with the exclusion of any other alternative forum, even if concurrent.

indemnity.title: 17. Indemnity
indemnity.content: The user agrees to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Patty Car (including employees, collaborators, suppliers, and partners) from any claim, legal action, damage, liability, expense, or loss arising from: violations of the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, or any other applicable policy by the user; improper use of the site and services; provision of incorrect information during registration, booking of services, or any other interaction with the site.

severability.title: 18. Severability Clause
severability.content: In the event that one or more provisions of this document are declared null, invalid, or unenforceable by a competent judicial or administrative authority, the remaining provisions will remain fully valid and effective.

assignment.title: 19. Assignment of Rights and Obligations
assignment.content: Patty Car reserves the right to assign or transfer all or part of its rights and obligations arising from this contract, including personal data collected, to third parties in case of sale, merger, reorganization, or other corporate operations.

acceptance.title: 20. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: The user, by accessing and using the website www.pattycar.com, declares to have read, understood, and accepted without reservation all the provisions of the Privacy Policy, Cookie Policy, and Terms of Service, as well as any other related legal documentation.
